src:
Metrolijn en 2000 woningen uur zonder stroom in Rotterdam-Alexander

05 Nov 2019, 11:09

Door een stroomstoring in Rotterdam-Prins Alexander zaten zo'n tweeduizend woningen tussen de A20 en het Hoge Bergse Bos vanaf 11:30 uur zonder stroom. Ook de metro had last van de stroomstoring, die even na 12:30 uur weer was verholpen.
De oorzaak was een kapotte elektriciteitskabel, zegt Stedin. Gedurende de storing reden er pendelbussen in plaats van de metro.
text:
Metro line and 2000 homes for hours without power in Rotterdam-Alexander

05 Nov 2019, 11:09

Due to a power outage in Rotterdam-Prince Alexander, around two thousand homes between the A20 and the Hoge Bergse Bos were without electricity from 11:30 am. The metro also suffered from the power outage, which was rectified just after 12:30 pm.
The cause was a broken electricity cable, says Stedin. During the outage there were shuttle buses instead of the metro.
